.. _SMAPgrmindex:

SMAP grm
========

| This is the manual for the component **SMAP grm** of the SMAP package.  
| **SMAP grm** was designed to create genetic relationship matrices (grm) based on multi-allelic haplotypes generated by **SMAP haplotype-sites** or **SMAP haplotype-window**.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
